# The `CodeGenTargetMachineImpl` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

implements a set of functionality in the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a></code> class for targets that make use of the independent code generator (CodeGen) library. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::CodeGenTargetMachineImpl</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

implements a set of functionality in the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a></code> class for targets that make use of the independent code generator (CodeGen) library.

Must not be used directly in code unless to inherit its implementation.

Definition at line 23 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-h">CodeGenTargetMachineImpl.h</a>.

### addPassesToEmitFile() {#a407b9cf0cf2cf2eead54ec1ffac0fa77}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CodeGenTargetMachineImpl::addPassesToEmitFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &amp; Out, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &#42; DwoOut, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a73b761f8d40500a5a28889569526b260">CodeGenFileType</a> FileType, bool DisableVerify=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfowrapperpass">MachineModuleInfoWrapperPass</a> &#42; MMIWP=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add passes to the specified pass manager to get the specified file emitted.

Typically this will involve several steps of code generation. <code>MMIWP</code> is an optional parameter that, if set to non-nullptr, will be used to set the MachineModuloInfo for this PM.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-h">CodeGenTargetMachineImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-cpp/#l00211">211</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-cpp">CodeGenTargetMachineImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### addPassesToEmitMC() {#a6070d53ab3c5060589362b14a68b17f0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CodeGenTargetMachineImpl::addPassesToEmitMC (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &#42;&amp; Ctx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &amp; Out, bool DisableVerify=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add passes to the specified pass manager to get machine code emitted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcjit">MCJIT</a>.

addPassesToEmitMC - Add passes to the specified pass manager to get machine code emitted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcjit">MCJIT</a>.

This method returns true if machine code is not supported. It fills the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> Ctx pointer which can be used to build custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer">MCStreamer</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-h">CodeGenTargetMachineImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-cpp/#l00241">241</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegentargetmachineimpl-cpp">CodeGenTargetMachineImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

createPassConfig - Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

Targets may override this to extend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig">TargetPassConfig</a>.

Get a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> implementation for the target.

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> returned uses the common code generator to answer queries about the IR.
